meanings.definition: The fish population in a particular region.
meanings.sent1: The ichthyofaunae in the lake includes various types of fish.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the ichthyofaunae in the river to understand the ecosystem better.
meanings.sent3: The ichthyofaunae in the aquarium had a meeting to discuss their favorite food.
meanings.sent4: The ichthyofaunae in the ocean danced gracefully in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The colorful ichthyofaunae in the pond sparkled like jewels under the moonlight.

meanings.definition: The study of fish species in a specific area.
meanings.sent1: Marine biologists conduct research on ichthyofaunae to protect endangered species.
meanings.sent2: Learning about ichthyofaunae helps us understand the impact of pollution on aquatic life.
meanings.sent3: During the ichthyofaunae class, the students had a fishy surprise quiz.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the ichthyofaunae of the deep sea is like diving into a mysterious world.
meanings.sent5: The book on ichthyofaunae was filled with colorful illustrations of different fish species.
